rationale: 'highly contagious' is a technical term, not an authorial intensifier on a general risk-adjective.
statement_text: Mexico said this week it would start vaccinating birds in high-risk areas after the highly contagious H5N1 strain was first detected in the country last month.

rationale: 'highly contagious' is a technical term guard and does not trigger Q2.
statement_text: Mexico said this week it would start vaccinating birds in high-risk areas after the highly contagious H5N1 strain was first detected in the country last month.
